description.english: Finish the main story line and get the good ending
Finish the main story line with a 'Challenging' mode hero
Finish the main story line with a 'Hardcore' or 'Cat-core' mode hero
Finish all quests given by Arath
Finish all quests given by Cathya
Finish all quests given by Elroy
Equip 3 epic items at the same time
Equip 6 epic items at the same time
Reach skill level 7 by allocating 7 points
Reach skill level 7 by allocating 7 points for 2 different skills
Reach skill level 7 by allocating 7 points for 3 different skills
Reach skill level 7 by allocating 7 points for 4 different skills
Reach skill level 7 by allocating 7 points for 5 different skills
Allocate at least 1 point in every skill of your hero class skill tree (non-ultimate)
Allocate at least 1 point in every skill of your path skill tree (non-ultimate)
Select a talent for your Familiar
Select all talents for your Familiar
Let your Familiar equip an item
Receive a permanent stat bonus through the  force of the ancestors
Receive 10 permanent stat bonuses through the force of the ancestors
Receive 25 permanent stat bonuses through the force of the ancestors
Receive 50 permanent stat bonuses through the force of the ancestors
Receive 100 permanent stat bonuses through the force of the ancestors
Receive 150 permanent stat bonuses through the force of the ancestors
Receive 200 permanent stat bonuses through the force of the ancestors
Receive 250 permanent stat bonuses through the force of the ancestors
Obtain an additional gem casket slot
Have a gem casket with 8 or more slots
Have a gem casket with 12 or more slots
Have a gem casket with 16 slots
Upgrade the rarity of an item
Apply a chaos enchantment to an item
Gamble an item at the merchant
Respec your skills at the merchant
Clear a dungeon in the Intermediate Realm
Clear a dungeon in the Intermediate Realm 3 times
Clear a dungeon in the Intermediate Realm 7 times
